Container.Name: discord-n8n-bot
Container.Overview:
Discord Gateway-based relay bot for Unraid.
This container maintains a persistent WebSocket connection to Discord and forwards incoming messages to a local n8n webhook endpoint. Ideal for integrating Discord with AI workflows (e.g., Ollama) in a secure, self-hosted setup.
No inbound ports required.
Container.Requires:
1. A Discord Bot Token (created via https://discord.com/developers/applications) 2. MESSAGE CONTENT INTENT enabled in the Discord Developer Portal 3. The bot token must be entered in the DISCORD_TOKEN variable 4. The bot must be invited to your server 5. An n8n webhook URL must be configured
No ports need to be exposed to the internet.
Security Notice: Keep your Discord Bot Token private and never commit it to public repositories.

Config.Name: N8N_WEBHOOK_URL
Config.Description: Full URL to your n8n webhook endpoint

Config.Name: REQUIRE_MENTION
Config.Description: Should the bot be explicitly mentioned? (true or false)

Config.Name: ALLOWED_CHANNEL_ID
Config.Description: Leave blank if you want the bot to respond in all channels
